SEARCH
Package it.polimi.worker

Class CheckPointManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.worker.CheckPointManager
public class CheckPointManager extends Object
The CheckPointManager class is used to manage the checkpoints. It contains the methods to create, read and delete the checkpoints.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createCheckpoint

      public void createCheckpoint(String programId, String pathString, CheckpointInfo checkPointObj, boolean forReduce)
      The createCheckpoint method creates a new checkpoint file. This method is invoked in the first phase when the program does not include a reduce operation unless it also includes a changekey operation. It is called upon completion of processing a partition.
      Parameters:
      programId - represents the program id.
      pathString - represents the path of the checkpoint file.
      checkPointObj - represents the checkpoint information.
      forReduce - represents whether the checkpoint is for the reduce operation or not.

    • getCheckPoint

      public CheckpointInfo getCheckPoint(String programId, String pathString, boolean forReduce)
      The getCheckPoint method reads the checkpoint file. This method is invoked in the first phase when the program does not include a reduce operation unless it also includes a changekey operation. It is called in the first phase before read the corresponding input file.
      Parameters:
      programId - represents the program id.
      pathString - represents the path of the checkpoint file.
      forReduce - represents whether the checkpoint is for the reduce operation or not.
      Returns:
      the checkpoint information.

    • createOutputDirectory

      private static void createOutputDirectory(String directory)
      The createOutputDirectory method creates a new directory. This method is invoked when the directory does not exist.
      Parameters:
      directory - represents the directory to create.

    • deleteCheckpoints

      public void deleteCheckpoints(String programId)
      The deleteCheckpoints method deletes the checkpoint files. This method is invoked at the end of the program.
      Parameters:
      programId - represents the program id.

    • deleteEmptyDirectory

      private static void deleteEmptyDirectory(File folder)
      The deleteEmptyDirectory method deletes the empty directory. This method is invoked at the end of the program.
      Parameters:
      folder - represents the directory to delete.
